column3: Faculty of Arts, Science and Technology
column5: Our Computing (Internet Technology and Security) MSc course allows you to study cyber security and cryptography. You will have the opportunity develop your research and analytical skills. You will also complete an individual thesis investigating an area related to an aspect of online secure computer systems design and development that are particularly of interest to you and is part of your career development plans.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
